mapper.insert: insert into board_reply values (board_reply_br_no_seq.nextval, #{fb_no}, #{br_content}, #{br_id}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT br_no, fb_no, br_content, br_id, br_date, br_edt FROM board_reply WHERE fb_no = #{fb_no} ORDER BY br_date DESC
mapper.update: update board_reply set br_content = #{br_content}, br_edt = SYSDATE where br_no = #{br_no}
